title: Justin Bieber has decked out his mansion with custom Drew House cartoon artwork worth $4,000
text:
Justin and Hailey Bieber's mansion is turning into a museum in itself.

The 25-year-old Coldwater singer has been adding some pricey artwork to his collection featuring custom cartoon designs of his clothing brand, Drew House.

His new pieces of art come at a cost of about $4,000 made by Idiot Box Art owners Emily Bright and Tamara Martin, TMZ reports.

Art collector: Justin Bieber has been adding some pricey artwork to his collection featuring custom cartoon designs of his clothing brand, Drew House

Art collector: Justin Bieber has been adding some pricey artwork to his collection featuring custom cartoon designs of his clothing brand, Drew House

The artwork includes a replica of a lego cartoon with the name of his clothing company, in addition to a hand painted logo of Drew.

Earlier this month, Bieber took to his Instagram to share a photo of himself lounging in his living room with his exotic cats revealing he was ready to sell his home.

'I’ll sell it with all the furniture . MAKE AN OFFER,' he wrote in the caption alongside the photo.

The outlet reports that since the post, he has received 'at least five prospective buyers.'

Details: The singer's collection includes a hand painted logo of the Drew logo (pictured hanging on the wall)

Up for sale: Earlier this month, Bieber took to his Instagram to share a photo of himself lounging in his living room with his exotic cats revealing he was ready to sell his home

Ready to sell? The outlet reports that since the post, he has received 'at least five prospective buyers'

The five bedroom, seven bathroom home is worth about what he paid for it when he bought the home with Mrs. Bieber almost a year ago for about $8.5 million dollars.

Their lavish retreat features a sunken family room, large kitchen and an even bigger center island, a home theater, and even a wine cellar.

It has yet to be said why the two newlyweds are plannings to move.

Fancy: The five bedroom, seven bathroom home is worth about what he paid for it when he bought the home with Mrs. Bieber almost a year ago for about 8.5 million dollars

Elegant: Their lavish retreat features a sunken family room, large kitchen and an even bigger center island, a home theater, and even a wine cellar

At the end of September, Justin and the supermodel exchanged their vows in their second wedding ceremony on their year anniversary in South Carolina.

The ceremony took place at Montage Hotel's Palmetto Bluff and brought in tons of famous celebrities to help them ring in the fun such as Kendall and Kylie Jenner, Kris Jenner and her boyfriend Corey Gamble, Camila Morrone, and Joan Smalls.

The two got engaged last summer while vacationing in the Bahamas shortly after rekindling their relationship, and Justin ending his relationship for good with his on-again-off-again relationship with Selena Gomez.

Details: Justin has a trail of snowboards that lead up the stairway to the mansion as well as a piece of abstract art
description: Justin and Hailey Bieber's mansion is turning into a museum in itself.The 25-year-old Coldwater singer has been adding some pricey artwork to his collection featuring custom cartoon designs.
